website_summaries.verdict: Although it comes from a well-known and respected manufacturer, this cowbell is extremely affordable.
pros: Delivers a low clunking tone, which is ideal for heavy music
Comes with dampening pads on the inside, which help muffle the tone and avoid it ringing out for too long
cons: Some drummers may prefer a brighter tone with more sustain

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Didn’t break the bank and does the trick... there are 4 foam strips for dampening inside. Curious to try the other sizes now.
customer_reviews.author: howard the paul

customer_reviews.title: Attachment Issue
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday. The wing nut is not properly sized for the bolt and does not tighten down therefore you cannot attach to drums. I am a retired drummer and have numerous spar parts and was able to find a wing nut that fits the threaded bolt and was able to mount the cow bell to my base drum attachment. Poor quality control regarding the mounting arrangement, otherwise good cow bell.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Great bell for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got the 7.5 inch and it's the perfect size, for me anyway. Sound is great for a cheap cowbell. There are muffle pads in there and I kept them there for now, it sounds fine for what I'm using it for but I guess I could take them out if I want MORE COWBELL. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: tmszewczyk

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound if you use a "little" pc of deadening foam pushed up inside it. Like a thin strip an inch wide but pushing on both the top and bottom side of bell. Unless you want it to ring on and on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivers the business
customer_reviews.text: You want that more cowbell deep tock and this does it just fine. You can stuff some more muting inside (please don’t use tape) to dry it out if you prefer, but this already has some mutes in it and sounds about right for a big rock bell. Get a heavy stick to thwack it with.
customer_reviews.author: peederj

customer_reviews.title: Great cowbell for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cowbell specifically to play Honky Tonk Women in my cover band. I was a little skeptical but am pleasantly surprised. The cowbell has some foam deadening pads inside, the metal is a reasonable thickness and the finish is consistent. Bottom line - this is a great sounding cowbell at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Mostly easily put: 5 star sound at a 3 star ...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly easily put: 5 star sound at a 3 star price. This bell delivers a low, sharp clunk. Comparing it to a smaller LP bell, the quality doesnt contest but doesn't seem cheaply made either. Has 4 small foam cubes inside to what I assume are for speeding the decay of the ring. Overall, this is a great bell for the price. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jairus R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cowbell.I love it.Well worth the money.For all drummers,, If you are a drummer the cowbell is a great price,great delivery service.The cowbell sounds out in a booming rich deep voice.Get one today.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Decent, Low-Cost Cowbell
customer_reviews.text: The size and price are right for this cowbell. The welds won't win any awards, but for the price, it seems like a good deal. The tone is a bit ringy, and it does come with some dampening foam on the inside, but one piece fell out almost immediately. I've got more foam weatherstripping laying around, so I'll use some of that.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Spade

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, scratches my cowbell fever
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a cowbell. Nothing fancy, just a solid cowbell sound. It does sound a bit high pitched and rings on for longer than I would like. Stuffing a bandana in it makes it sound perfect.

customer_reviews.title: okay for the price but
customer_reviews.text: it's okay- and sounds okay- however not as good as a couple other ones at this price point. I also have a pearl that cost 16$ that sounds way better. however- who knows? you may need something to sound like this one does....
customer_reviews.author: kpdrumswritessings

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Good, Mounts Bad
customer_reviews.text: The wingnut and inner bolt that is used for mounting are not the same thread pitch and will strip when tightened. Or, the metal is just too soft, like a light, metallic butter. Luckily, it was sold to a guy who'd rather fix the problem then send a product back. I gotta have more cowbell, baby.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Nell

customer_reviews.title: A fine bell.
customer_reviews.text: This cowbell is built like a tank and sounds great. I plan to use it handheld on a recording, but the drum mount is also very solid.
customer_reviews.author: N. C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not charging
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this battery for 2 months. I was able to charge it 100% when I first received it. Now, I have had it for a couple of months it is only charging to 66%. I have shut my laptop down to see if that would run a complete charge and it does not change. I do not recommend this. Sometimes it is too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Monique E. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Returned for a new one and it still would not tighten. Very disappointed. Will not purchase from seller again. How do you get two and neither works?
customer_reviews.author: Wife and Mom

customer_reviews.title: I bought a cowbell for my drum set.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played drums for years, not professionally, and have needed a cowbell but never got one. This one is large, has a good sound and was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Foster

customer_reviews.title: To put you in the MOO..d
customer_reviews.text: I got a drum set for Christmas and what would it be without the ring of the cowbell? Well packed, on time and just a good experience. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jane H

customer_reviews.title: clang clang clang
customer_reviews.text: This sounds just like a cowbell. I think I have already dented it from the love I have of smashing it with the sticks. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Techtesting

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Cow Bell Sound
customer_reviews.text: This cow bell is the perfect size, and sound for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Little dampening pads inside don't do much. Sounds good though. Nice tone.
customer_reviews.author: owlRnothing

customer_reviews.title: Mount hardware was bad
customer_reviews.text: The mounting hardware was low cost and was stripped before I even used it. I ended up using some old hardware I luckily had laying around. The sound was OK at best. I would not buy again. Great price though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty excited about this purchase, looks nice & sounds right. Quick shipping & just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad cowbell. Def good for the money. Decent sound. Help me playing “Killing in the Name of”
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: More Cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: Has a great tone/sound and is very sturdy! More Cowbell!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sound like the song Welcome to the Jungle! Buy Guns and Roses!
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good sound for a inexpensive cow bell ... I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item, specially for the price. I like that it has muffle pads inside that control the ring and keep it's time sharp. You will need a bass drum bracket to connect it too a bass or tom... If you don't like it in the high hat.
customer_reviews.author: S.Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: It's a cowbell.
customer_reviews.text: Good for classroom use. There are foam dampeners inside the bell but still plenty of ring to the sound.
customer_reviews.author: DRR

customer_reviews.title: Good cowbell for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cowbell for the drummer in my group. He seems to like it and says its a good sturdy cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: hardware sucks
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect the hardware to hold this cowbell. I ordered this twice and both times the bolt was stripped to the point of useless. And they charged me twice. Look around for something that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: loves music more than anything

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing!! Not to big, and very well designed. I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Leal

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome I don’t think my neighbors enjoy it as much as I do
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Kistner

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to your kit
customer_reviews.text: What can one say a cowbell is a cowbell. This has a nice crisp tone, the mounting hardware that came with it works easy for set up. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tassina

customer_reviews.title: Nice but foam parts fall off
customer_reviews.text: Nice sounding cowbell. It's only flaw is the 4 muting foam pads on the inside falls off. I had to tape the first 2 on the day I tried them. Otherwise they sound nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, you can attache it or hold in your hand. It has good sound
customer_reviews.author: quist

customer_reviews.title: Solid and cheap bell!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, perfect size to mount on a drumset and solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: LRod1707

customer_reviews.title: gave as gift
customer_reviews.text: Don't know much about item, but gift receiver likes it and arrived as described,and quick shipping
customer_reviews.author: donna c.

customer_reviews.title: Just enough cowbell
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect for a rocktober church skit we did. It was big and sturdy and not too heavy where our female lead had to much trouble holding it. The sound was nice- we used a drum stick from guitar hero and sounded fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I've got a fever...
customer_reviews.text: Turns out the only cure was this item. I can really explore the space with it!
customer_reviews.author: Runners Dial Zero

customer_reviews.title: Crushing disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item, and the bolt was stripped. Got a replacement, and the bolt was stripped on that too. Buy nice or buy twice. Or in my case three times.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing, if you love playing Latin music this gives spice to the music.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great bell for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Not "quite" the sound we desired, but sounds really close for the price paid! Really happy with this purchase. For those who have issues mounting... It mounts to the "hi hat" stand just above the hi hat symbols. At least this was the best way that we mounted ours.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C. Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: Its okay for money but only for drum set
customer_reviews.text: The cowbell was not sturdy enough to be used in a marching band environment during band camp the cowbell broke.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Cowbell crazy...
customer_reviews.text: Little boy loved it...that & the drum set driving Mom crazy...!
customer_reviews.author: sandra calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one sounds like a cowbell is supposed to sound!
customer_reviews.author: nwmike

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: Good sound ,great price Could not ask for any more.
customer_reviews.author: Walter jeanson

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new sound to my drum set! I have to say it was easy to install and the sound is perfect! Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Cheapish
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get what you pay for... Not a good tone
customer_reviews.author: patrick davis

customer_reviews.title: "I have a fever, and the cure is more cowbell."
customer_reviews.text: This one has little pads inside to deaden the ring a little bit. It mounts on a high-hat. It sounds like a cowbell should IMHO. Now I can play Nazareth's Hair of the Dog, Grazing in the Grass, and Grand Funk Railroad's American Band. WooHoo!
customer_reviews.author: guppypants

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cow bell
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cow bell. Exactly what I imagined--well constructed and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a good cowbell for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a reinforced edge. Otherwise, a good cowbell for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dunleavy

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made! Fits any stand.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. I bought this to add onto my son's acoustic drum set. It fits on nicely. Since I don't play drums, I wasn't sure about the sound quality, but he likes it. I've learned more now and there are many different cow bells on the market for different sounds. This one is a little more "tinny" with a higher tone. If you want a deeper tone, you won't be happy. For us, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Pashak

customer_reviews.title: So Loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cowbell. It is loud and has a good tone to it. Though it's made for a kit, it works just fine as a hand-held.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck B.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm a general music teacher and needed a smallish cowbell quick and cheap, and this was exactly what I would have expected and as pictures. The only thin that was odd was the small foam pieces stuck inside. Not sure if that's normal, but works and sounds fine for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: suzysavin45

customer_reviews.title: nice because it is un-overpowering!
customer_reviews.text: very good size for performing. I play small stays' coffee houses' restaurants, and this fits the bill. it also has nice dampening pads installed within, to lessen' the ring. a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: For those who need more cowbell, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't begin to express how satisfying it was to receive this along with the Meinl Percussion COW1 Cowbell Beater with Ribbed Grip, Natural Finish, I had ordered at the same time. These two items are responsible for countless hours of joy in our home. Everyone needs more cowbell and get it from this Stagg CB305BK 5.5-Inch Cowbell-Black. We leave it near the front door when not in use as to allow anyone entering our home the opportunity to experience its purity in tone. Don't deny yourself any longer the basic affordable goodness this world has to offer. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Zon

customer_reviews.title: It's a cowbell
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the Dixon Cowbell post PRCBH268R-SP. Pretty normal cowbell sound, not cheap sounding. Has held up to some rigorous pounding. More cowbell, I need more cowbell!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality cowbell. Not sure how the clamp works, I just use it by hand for percussion. Good sound.
customer_reviews.author: VLD13

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have fever and the only prescription is more cowbell
customer_reviews.author: Kaveh Noorbakhsh

customer_reviews.title: Soft Hitters Required
customer_reviews.text: It has a great sound but it cracked down the side within the first fifteen minutes of me using it in a practice situation, good for soft hitters, not for hard ones
customer_reviews.author: The Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price! Has just enough dampening with foam pads already installed.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Wilt

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend of mine as a gift, never know what to expect buying cheaply priced stuff online, but he loves it and it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Stagg CB305BK 5.5-Inch Cowbell - Black
customer_reviews.text: Simply does what it"s intended for. Sounds good. What else can I say? Ok, Here's a word - It's a cowbell!
customer_reviews.author: Steddy

customer_reviews.title: bell works I used it on a drum set, but I think they might be better on timbales.
customer_reviews.text: I think for drums they work well, but if you play salsa LP will work better, but it's great having a cha cha bell at all times, I used it. ffsalsa/ff
customer_reviews.author: ffsalsa/ff

product_meta.title: Stagg CB306BK 6.5-InchRock Cowbell for Drumset - Black
product_meta.description: Style:Cowbell| Size:6.5"| Color:BlackFrom our finest dual-hammered cymbals to our acclaimed TIM drum kits, Stagg will make you stay in the rhythm!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars382 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
